title: Asian Markets End Year on AI Optimism as Precious Metals and Currencies Shine
description: Asian stocks edged lower on the final trading day of the year, capping a period in which investors largely looked past tariff-related uncertainty and instead focused on the powerful rally in artificial intelligence chip...
